instructions_to_main_agent.general: Build a professional, multi-tenant SaaS dashboard in French. Use the 'Swiss & High-Contrast' design archetype. Prioritize clarity, data density, and trust.
instructions_to_main_agent.language: All UI text MUST be in French (fr-FR).
instructions_to_main_agent.theme: Default to Light Mode. Use Slate-900 for the sidebar to create a strong anchor. Use Blue-600 for primary actions.
layout_rules: Use a fixed left sidebar navigation.
Use a top header for global search, notifications, and user profile.
Use a 'Bento' grid layout for dashboard widgets.
Ensure all cards have consistent padding (p-6) and subtle borders.
component_overrides: Customize Shadcn cards to remove heavy shadows and use 1px borders.
Use 'Inter' font for all body text.
Ensure tables are dense and easy to scan.

pages.login: Clean, split-screen layout. Left side: Login form. Right side: Abstract network background with a dark overlay and a quote or value prop.
pages.dashboard_home: Overview of all modules. KPI cards at the top. Recent activity list.
pages.compliance: ISO maturity score (Radial Chart). List of recent audits. Compliance status by department.
pages.enterprise_brain: IQI Score (Gauge Chart). Document processing status. AI usage badges.
pages.ai_governance: Executive view. Authorized vs Blocked AI (Pie Chart). Critical actions list (Red accents).
pages.settings: Tabbed interface. Toggles for ISO modules. Sliders for AI thresholds.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
